sentences.english: There is no doubt he is the "Rock Star" CEO.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，他就是傳說中的“搖滾明星式”CEO。

sentences.english: There is no doubt that travelling broadens one’s mind and enlarge/improve/increase one’s knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，旅行使人開闊眼界，增長知識。

sentences.english: It surely ranks among the most valuable literary artifacts in America.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，它算得上美國最珍貴的文學遺產之一。

sentences.english: Surely the kisses of her bought red mouth were sweet;
sentences.chinese: 無疑地，買來的櫻脣之吻是如此甜蜜。

sentences.english: In fact, Yang Chengxing's case is by no means a rare one.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，毫無疑問，楊誠星的例子是很罕見的。

sentences.english: There’s no doubt that law schools have overbuilt and that the legal profession has overpromised.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，法學院過多了，並對法定職業誇下海口。

sentences.english: No doubt inadvertently, Samsung feeds this delusion.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，三星助長了這種錯覺。

sentences.english: The lawyers are, no doubt, rubbing their hands.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，律師們正摩拳擦掌，躍躍欲試。

sentences.english: Unsurprisingly, the product image and the bright orange buttons.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，是產品圖像和淺橙色的按鈕。

sentences.english: “There’s no question that Dr. Kearns’ wiper circuit was interesting, ” Daykin says.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，卡恩斯博士的雨刷電路是非常有意思的。

sentences.english: The bottom? Baghdad once again comes in at 215.
sentences.chinese: 伊拉克的巴格達無疑再次中標。

sentences.english: Because, slowly but surely, you are doing your gender a disservice.
sentences.chinese: 因爲慢慢你會發現你無疑在給你的男性魅力幫倒忙。

sentences.english: His modesty certainly appealed to the public.
sentences.chinese: 他的謙遜無疑使民衆傾心。

sentences.english: Traveling is unarguably one of the most gratifying experiences a person can have in their lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 旅遊無疑是人一生中的一個最振奮人心的經歷之一。

sentences.english: But the price for such solidarity will be very high.
sentences.chinese: 但毫無疑問這種團結的代價將無比高昂。

sentences.english: It is no doubt a pleasant thing to have a library left you.
sentences.chinese: 有個現成的書樓遺贈給你，那無疑是一樁快事。

definition: regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
one step further/to move forward a step/further onwards
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
